commit.message:
re PR c++/12727 (mipsisa64-elf -mips32 regression: g++.dg/eh/registers1.C)

	PR target/12727
	* config/mips/mips.c (mips_save_reg): Fix frame information for sdc1
	on 32-bit big-endian targets.

From-SVN: r74071

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@

+
+	PR target/12727
+	* config/mips/mips.c (mips_save_reg): Fix frame information for sdc1
+	on 32-bit big-endian targets.

 	* genemit.c (register_constraints): Remove.
